mapper.sql: employee_id, login_name, password, real_name, gender, birthday, dept, position, rank, monthly_pay, hired_time, hire_year, employee_status
mapper.insert: insert into employee (employee_id, login_name, password, real_name, gender, birthday, dept, position, rank, monthly_pay, hired_time, hire_year, employee_status) values (#{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dept,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{monthlyPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hireYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{employeeStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.update:
update employee
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

hired_time = #{hiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hire_year = #{hireYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
employee_status = #{employeeStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
